title: An Unprovoked Killing Leaves a Void in a Bronx Neighborhood
description: Nathaniel Rivers, 35, was sitting in his car when a man fatally stabbed him for no reason. Months later, the crime continues to rattle residents.
dc:creator: Hurubie Meko and Téa Kvetenadze
media:credit: Caitlin Ochs for The New York Times
media:description: Friends and family members of Nathaniel Rivers put up a poster of photographs outside his apartment in the Bronx on Friday.
